Paragraph: The 185delAG mutation in BRCA1 is detected in Ashkenazi Jews both in familial breast and ovarian cancer and in the general population .

| breast cancer (in Ashkenazi Jews) |
| ovarian cancer (in Ashkenazi Jews) |
| cancer (in the general population) |
